column4: Yes. Also, how can I determine if there is hw-raid on the server?
I know it used to have raid1, but I don't know if its software or hardware.
if it's hardware raid, it should appear as ordinary scsi drive to linux. If it's software raid, Linux will see the single disks until told otherwise.
yes (see also DasEi's answer - /dev/md... is software raid).
